Articles.Content:
Just linking to this since this is the forum I normally check for updates and would have missed this entirely if it wasn't linked to in another post.  Also..... discuss!

After finally giving up on PS4 version and switching to PC I'm still really excited to see this update.  I miss trophies.

Indeed, waiting on this one here, current version is way to glitchy to want to spend time with, just too frustrating, least Squad have taken a 'nuke from orbit and restart' approach here.

And to get the full new version, bonus
God I wish my pc wasn't broken
